/*
    Aleksandar "Al3kSaNdaR" Ivanovic

    EQCANDY
*/
#include <cstdio>

using namespace std;

typedef long long int lld;

const int MaxN = 1 << 14;

int T, N, C[MaxN];

int main ( void )
{
    scanf ( "%d", &T );

    while ( T-- )
    {
        scanf ( "%d", &N );

        for ( int i = 0; i < N; i++ ) scanf ( "%d", &C[i] );

        int L = 0, R = 1000000000, Sol = 0;

        while ( L <= R )
        {
            int M = ( L + R ) >> 1;

            lld Carry = 0LL;
            bool Can = true;

            for ( int i = 0; i < N; i++ )
            {
                Carry += 1LL * ( C[i] - M );

                if ( Carry < 0LL )
                {
                    Can = false;

                    break;
                }
            }

            if ( Can )
            {
                L = M + 1;

                if ( M > Sol ) Sol = M;
            }
            else R = M - 1;
        }

        printf ( "%d\n", Sol );
    }

    return 0;
}
